name: Codeine
title: Codeine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of semantic clinical drugs (SCD) and generic pack (GPCK) RxNorm codes aims to capture orders of the opioid medication codeine.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are prescribed codeine.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include RxNorm SCD and GPCK type codes that identify codeine medications.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
